clauses.dataProtection: Provider shall comply with UK GDPR and Data Protection Act 2018. A separate Data Processing Agreement is required if processing personal data on behalf of Customer.
clauses.consumerRights: If Customer is a consumer, nothing in this Agreement affects statutory rights under Consumer Rights Act 2015.
clauses.unfairTerms: Limitation of liability clauses comply with Unfair Contract Terms Act 1977 and Consumer Rights Act 2015.
clauses.paymentTerms: Late payment interest charged under Late Payment of Commercial Debts (Interest) Act 1998.
clauses.vatClause: All fees are exclusive of VAT, which shall be added at the prevailing rate.
